piiksuma.database

Class Mapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • piiksuma.database.Mapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Mapped class type. Used to check assigments when returning query results.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteMapper, InsertionMapper, QueryMapper, UpdateMapper 

    public abstract class Mapper<T>
extends Object
    Common functionality between all the Mapper Classes.
    Author:
    luastan, CardamaS99, danimf99, alvrogd, OswaldOswin1, Marcos-marpin

      • setIsolationLevel

        public Mapper<T> setIsolationLevel(int isolationLevel)
                            throws PiikDatabaseException
        Stores the given isolation level to apply it when executing the constructed transaction
        Parameters:
        isolationLevel - desired transaction isolation level
        Returns:
        mapper which is being built
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException

      • setConnection

        public void setConnection(Connection connection)

      • fkValue

        protected Object fkValue(Object forKeyObject)
                  throws IllegalAccessException
        Extracts the Primary Key value from a given object
        Parameters:
        forKeyObject - Object to be extracted the value from. Normally corresponding to a foreign key object
        Returns:
        Object's Primary Key value
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - In case of being unable to grab the field value

      • createUpdate

        public Mapper<T> createUpdate(String update)
                       throws PiikDatabaseException
        Allows an update to be specified whith SQL.
        Parameters:
        update - String with the SQL code to be used in the update
        Returns:
        The current Mapper instance
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException

      • getFK

        protected Object getFK(Class<?> clase,
                       Object pkObject)
                throws PiikDatabaseException
        Queries a foreign key and maps it automatically
        Parameters:
        clase - Class to be looped over
        pkObject - Object used as a parameter within the query to find the tuple in the database
        Returns:
        Mapped instance from the query result set. When the class isn't annotated with MapperTable returns null.
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException

      • getFK

        protected Object getFK(Class<?> clase,
                       Map<String,Object> pkeys)
                throws PiikDatabaseException
        Queries a foreign key and maps it automatically.
        Parameters:
        clase - Class to be looped over
        pkeys - Object used as a parameter within the query to find the tuple in the database
        Returns:
        Mapped instance from the query result set. When the class isn't annotated with MapperTable returns null.
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException

      • getFKs

        public Map<String,Object> getFKs(T object)
                          throws PiikDatabaseException
        Function that returns the foreign keys of the object, of atomic form
        Parameters:
        object - object to get the foreign keys
        Returns:
        the foreign keys indexed by the name of column
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException

      • getAtomicPK

        protected Map<String,Object> getAtomicPK(Object object)
                                  throws PiikDatabaseException
        Function that returns the primary keys of an object in an atomic form, ready to be used in an SQL query
        Parameters:
        object - object from which the primary keys are obtained
        Returns:
        a map with the primary keys indexed by the name of column
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException

      • isAtomicClass

        public boolean isAtomicClass(Class<?> classField)
        Function to know if a class type is atomic or not
        Parameters:
        classField - type of class to analyze
        Returns:
        true if the class is contained in the set of the atomic classes. In another case, false

      • getPK

        public Map<String,Field> getPK()
        Function to return the fields of the primary keys of the mappedClass
        Returns:
        the fields indexed by the name of the column

      • getPK

        protected Map<String,Field> getPK(Class<?> mappedClass)
        Function to return the fields of the primary keys of the mappedClass
        Parameters:
        mappedClass - class from which to obtain the primary keys
        Returns:
        the fields indexed by the name of the column

      • defineClass

        public Mapper<T> defineClass(Class<? extends T> mappedClass)
        Defines the Class to be used when mapping the subsequent query results
        Parameters:
        mappedClass - Class for the results to be mapped to
        Returns:
        The mapper instance

                           throws PiikDatabaseException

      • configureConnection

        protected void configureConnection()
                            throws PiikDatabaseException
        This method is intended to be executed before performing a transaction. It will set the connection's required attributes to the ones stored in the Mapper.
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException
